name: Advanced Directing
description: An exploration of advanced directing for the theatre. The class is centered on student directed productions, which are publically presented at the end of term. Emphasis is placed on the development of strong central concepts and realizing the production with imagination, collaboration and creativity. Priority is reserved for Drama Majors and Specialists. The Application Deadline is March 10th.
department: Centre for Drama, Theatre and Performance Studies
prerequisites: Specialist or Major in Drama with a minimum CGPA of 2.7; DRM220Y1/DRM230Y1; DRM302H1; DRM331H1; a written proposal and an interview in April.
